$name could be feeling the challenge of their work at the moment. Fortunately, $name is also not too far from Flow, either. Regardless, it is an excellent time to step in and offer support and see if there is anything you can do to mitigate the size of the challenge they are experiencing before it creeps up to Anxiety.

Encourage $name to raise the alarm earlier in future scenarios and dive into the parts of their work causing them the most difficulty. Could they use more training? More supervision or coaching? Earlier or more regular feedback?
